Key Match Events: Lane Thomas hit a grand slam off of Tarik Skubal in the bottom of the fifth inning
Post-Match Reflections: The Tigers will head home after a very successful season and the most shocking and exciting stretch drive in team history
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians advanced to the ALCS
Others: The Tigers battled but couldn't find the answering shot to pick up their ace
The Guardians held off some late threats to win 7-3
